basics.name: Tianyu Wang
basics.label: Assistant Professor
basics.summary: Looking for an opportunity to use my machine learning skills and data science domain knowledge in the field of Business, Finance and Cybersecurity.

work.summary: Devops ecommerce magento2 working on AWS infrastructure with Ansible/Docker/GithubAction. Magento2 developper for medium/large companies.
highlights: Taught 10 undergraduate-level and 2 graduate-level sessions in Computer Science
Designed and instructed classes in Programming, Data Science, Data Anaytics, Machine Learning
Adviced students about career path in CS/DS/IT/Cybersecurity

work.summary: Designed and implemented prototype solutions for network data in leveraging machine learning, deep learning, natural language processing, and graph algorithms using Python, Spark and Scala. Extracted billions of network data with data wrangling and automated data processing pipelines. Deployed real-time deep learning models in network log analytics using TensorFlow

Deployed 7x24 enterprise level servers and cybersecurity hacking & attacking environments for graduate level courses. Configured Palo Alto Firewall for National Collegiate Cyber Defense Competition (CCDC) Lab. Managed department servers using VMware ESXi platform
highlights: Updated server hard-disks from RAID 5 to RAID 10
Monitored network logs using Elasticsearch packages

work.summary: Coached students for National Collegiate Cyber Defense Competition (CCDC). Configured Layer-3 Palo Alto Firewall for CCDC Lab Environments. Taught Palo Alto and pfSense Firewall techniques and cyber defense strategies. Instructed students monitoring network logs using Elasticsearch packages and analyzing packets using Wireshark

Provided technical knowledge and analysis to support IT security policies, baselines and recommendations. Assisted Chief Information Security Officer (CISO) to enhance IT critical security controls assessment and risk management
Reconciled international bank accounts. Identified discrepancies among 19 banks accounts with 7 different currencies and tracked revenue adjustments between bank statements and company's database
